          <title>
            <string language="en">Controlling thickness of paper using beta radiation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Steuernstärke des Papiers mit Betastrahlung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Épaisseur de contrôle de papier en utilisant

radiación beta</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a set-up for controlling the thickness of paper using beta radiation.</string>
